functions.name: search_news
functions.description: Search the web for a given query
functions.trigger_instruction:
*When user is seeking real-time information and the latest developments, like news, weather, trending info, or I need to ensure refreshness of info to address user query, invoke {"tool":"search_news"};
  *If the user query is vague or having no explicit intent, invoke {"tool":"search_news"};
